article_metadata.news_keywords: dean college,campus cops,teamops,paula rooney,the sun chronicle,sun chronicle,attleboro sun chronicle,franklin,local_news,local_news

og.description: FRANKLIN — Dean College is doing away with its police force and contracting public safety duties with an agency that handles security for the New England Patriots, a move that led to the police filing a complaint with the federal government.
og.title: Dean College dropping campus cops

article_metadata.keywords: dean college,campus cops,teamops,paula rooney,the sun chronicle,sun chronicle,attleboro sun chronicle,franklin,local_news,local_news
